channel.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
channel.description:
I'm very curious to see how people play Half-Life 1 and which version everyone thinks is better.
Do you prefer GoldSrc Half-Life 1? If so, what version? Do you like the vanilla version or the HD pack? Or do you still play the original CD version from back in the day?
Or do you prefer Half-Life: Source? I personally prefer this one because of its updated physics, better lighting, water, and better particle effects. But, it does change some parts of the game. Such as the water where you fight the ichthyosaur being clear which slightly changes the level design.
What do you prefer?

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

First, why the necropost?

Second, Half-Life does have autosaving.

I wanted to state an opinion, then I’ll let it die.
And I was talking about Half-Life Source not having auto-save.

Read full topic

Second, Half-Life does have autosaving.

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
Well, I like Half-Life better than Source, even though the graphics are better at some places in Source. Because unless you quicksave like a dumbass, you’ll have to restart all the way to the beginning if you die.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: shadowscrawl
item.description:
parity:

I said that with the hidef package it’s really better but without, they’re equal

but there are high def packages for both source and gldsrc

so wouldn’t they still be equal?

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: Dark_Signal
item.description:
I like Half Life over Half Life Source, because there were larger explosions, enemies would have death animations, and they’d also gib more often, which was always fun to watch.
Honestly, HL Source was a really cheap remake. In fact isn’t that the entire reason Black Mesa Source is being developed to begin with? I know I saw that from them somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source

item.description:
I’m sorry, but that actually looks like two pancakes.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: UrBY
item.description:
fucker88:

I plan to remake all maps from HL: S to look very near to the original I’ll form a little team for that, after BM release to use all resources to create something special

…I don’t… even know where to start with that post.

So, here’s a try.

You want to remake Half-Life, based on Half-Life: Source, using Black Mesa’s content, to look closer to what it already looks like…?

Been a while since I needed this image.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: parity
item.description:
Got the original HL and the Source version. Both are equal.

The “real” HL isn’t pretty as the source version but looks more “authentic”. It reminds me my first LANs with HL DM (I have both Steam -1.1.1.0- and Non Steam Version (1.0)) and the earlies CS betas.
The source version adds some better lightning and particle effects, plus some extra like the “source” water. Got a little package that enables hires textures (like the hidef package for Blue Shift) and some nice effects : it’s really better than the original HL, imho.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
GamaTeam30:

Here’s the thing:
The pushing in Half-Life and probably gold source is messed up. Half Life : Source Fixes that, though the graphics are not tweaked. I think Half Life : Source graphics are perfectly fine.It doesn’t matter about looks, but it matters about Gameplay. So I like HL : S.

I’m new to Black Mesa : Source forums.

There’s only a few places in the game where you have to push stuff and I’ve never had a problem with it.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Half-Life VS. Half-Life: Source
item.dc:creator: lunertexcosmo
item.description:
Never heard of this glitch. Surely Valve would have fixed something like that. Is it possible some of your game files may be messed up? It’s happened to me many times before. Have you tried re-installing?
